FIELD.NAME: HEADER-VERSION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Version Number for this message description.

FIELD.NAME: MESSAGE-TYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Message type identifier: REQ, RESP, or MSG

FIELD.NAME: MESSAGE-SUBTYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Unique message identifier, fixed for GMSEC Standard Messages

FIELD.NAME: CONTENT-VERSION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Version Number for this message content description

FIELD.NAME: MSG-ID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Unique ID used by the Requestor and the Publisher to distinguish the message

FIELD.NAME: C2CX-SUBTYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Identifies the type of information being transferred between the Components

FIELD.NAME: NUM-OF-DEVICES
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of devices being reported in this message

FIELD.NAME: DEVICE.1.NAME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Name of the device

FIELD.NAME: DEVICE.1.NUMBER
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A number assigned to the device to distinguish it from identical devices.

FIELD.NAME: DEVICE.1.MODEL
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Model number of the device.

FIELD.NAME: DEVICE.1.SERIAL
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Serial number of the device.

FIELD.NAME: DEVICE.1.VERSION
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Version of the firmware operating within the device.

FIELD.NAME: DEVICE.1.GROUP
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Name of group associated with

FIELD.NAME: DEVICE.1.ROLE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Role the device has, if known

FIELD.NAME: DEVICE.1.STATUS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Indicates the condition of the device being reported. The reporting component may choose the condition level based on its own criteria.

FIELD.NAME: DEVICE.1.INFO
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An additional status code that can be supplied that is specific to that device.

FIELD.NAME: DEVICE.1.NUM-OF-PARAMS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Number of additional parameters being reported that are associated with the device.

FIELD.NAME: DEVICE.1.PARAM.1.NAME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Name of the additional parameter.

FIELD.NAME: DEVICE.1.PARAM.1.TIME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Time of parameter sampling

FIELD.NAME: DEVICE.1.PARAM.1.VALUE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Value of the named parameter being reported. Component must ascertain the data type before accessing the value (e.g. with a function call). Of type 'Variable' in the GMSEC ISD.
